select reply_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reply_table(reply_idx, reply_writer_name, reply_text, reply_board_idx, reply_content_idx, reply_date) values (#{reply_idx}, #{reply_writer_name}, #{reply_text}, #{reply_board_idx}, #{reply_content_idx}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select reply_writer_name, reply_text, to_char(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reply_date from reply_table where reply_board_idx = 1 and reply_content_idx = #{content_idx} order by reply_idx asc
